images.copyright: African elephants, Amboseli National Park, Kenya (© Ruzdi Ekenheim/Getty Images)
images.title: Herd you loud and clear
images.caption: World Elephant Day
images.desc: Get ready to celebrate elephants, the largest living land animals. There are three elephant species alive today: African bush, African forest, and Asian. All three species are endangered, and World Elephant Day is dedicated to highlighting the challenges they face, like the ivory trade and habitat loss.
